bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with sai man 塞滿① , blockage with fullness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 7: 風緩湯， 治脚弱，舉體痹不仁，熱毒氣入臟，胸中滿塞不通，食即嘔吐方 , “The decoction for wind that brings forth sluggishness: a recipe to cure weakness of the legs, blockage and numbness of the entire body, qi of heat poison entering the depots, fullness and blockage in the chest and center. The food one eats is thrown up again”.
